short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Volume adjuster for audio posts on Tumblr.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more sudden volume surprises while scrolling.
Only works on tumblr.com!

Key Features:
- Default Volume Setting: Set a preferred volume level for all audio posts.
- Individual Volume Control: Adjust the volume of each audio post separately.
- Customizable Slider Styles: Choose from Block, Circle, or Hidden slider designs.
- Cross-Device Sync: Your settings carry over between your devices.
- Seamless Integration: Blends naturally with Tumblr's interface.

How It Works:
- Install the Volumr extension.
- Browse Tumblr as usual.
- Notice the new volume slider on audio posts.
- Adjust volume levels to your liking.
- Click the "Volumr" icon in your extensions to adjust settings.

Volumr respects your privacy and only operates on Tumblr pages. It doesn't collect or store any personal data.
